Package solver.search.loop.monitors

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IMessage

    IMonitorClose
    An interface to monitor close operation of the search loop
    IMonitorContradiction
    An interface to monitor contradiction in search loop
    IMonitorDownBranch
    An interface to monitor down branch actions in the search loop
    IMonitorInitialize
    An interface to monitor the initialization action of the search loop
    IMonitorInitPropagation
    An interface to monitor the initial propagation of the search loop
    IMonitorInterruption
    An interface to monitor interruption of the search loop
    IMonitorOpenNode
    An interface to monitor open node action in the search loop
    IMonitorRestart
    An interface to monitor restart instruction in the search loop
    IMonitorSolution
    An interface to monitor solution instruction in the search loop
    IMonitorUpBranch
    An interface to monitor up branch actions in the search loop
    ISearchMonitor

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AverageCSV
    A search monitor that trace the results in a CSV format file
    FailPerPropagator

    LogBasic
    Basic search monitor logger, which prints welcome message at the beginning od the search and search statistics at the end of the search.
    LogChoices
    A search monitor logger which prints choices during the search.
    LogChoicesWithRank
    A search monitor logger which prints choices during the search.
    LogContradiction

    LogPropagationCount

    LogSolutions
    A search monitor logger which prints solution during the search.
    MatrixOutput

    OutputCSV
    A search monitor that trace the results in a CSV format file
    RestartManager

    SearchMonitorFactory

    SearchMonitorList

    SMF
    A short-named version of SearchMonitorFactory

    Enum Description
